item.title: Everyone loves Jaguar
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: PC Magazine has a short review of the 17" iMac and Jaguar. I'm pretty excited about Jaguar! New York Times even reviews Jaguar: This is a polished, innovative and ? if such a term can be applied to something as nerdy as an operating system ? exciting upgrade. ... Apple is not Microsoft that's the understatement of the year and isn't nearly so Big Brotherish. ... Mac OS X 10.2 is the best-looking, least-intrusive and most thoughtfully designed operating system walking the earth today.
